00023 #include <avr/io.h>
00024 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 unsigned char usart1_transmit(char  data );
00034 void usart0_init(unsigned int baudrate) {
00035         /* Set baud rate */
00036         UBRR0H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00037         UBRR0L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00038         /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00039         UCSR0C = (0<<UMSEL0) | (0<<USBS0) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0) | (0<<UCSZ2);
00040         /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00041         UCSR0B = (1<<RXEN0) | (1<<TXEN0) | (1<<RXCIE0);
00042 }
00043 
00048 unsigned char usart0_transmit(char  data ) {
00049         /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00050         while (!( UCSR0A & (1<<UDRE0)));
00051         /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00052         UDR0 = data;
00053         return 0;
00054 }
00055 
00061 unsigned char usart0_sendstring(char *data,unsigned char length) {
00062         int i;
00063         for (i=0;i<length;i++)
00064                 usart0_transmit(*(data++));
00065         
00066         return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00074 unsigned char usart0_receive(void ) {
00075         /* Wait for data to be received */
00076         while (!(UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00077         /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00078         return UDR0;
00079 }
00080 
00086 unsigned char usart0_receive_loopback(void ) {
00087         uint8_t rbuff;
00088         /* Wait for data to be received */
00089         while (!(UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00090         /* Get and return received data from buffer */
00091         rbuff = UDR0;
00092         usart0_transmit(rbuff);
00093         return rbuff;
00094 }
00095 
00101 unsigned char poll_usart0_receive(void ) {
00102         /* Check if data is received */
00103         return ((UCSR0A & (1<<RXC0)));
00104 }
00105 
00112 void usart1_init(unsigned int baudrate) {
00113         /* Set baud rate */
00114         UBRR1H = (unsigned char) (baudrate>>8);
00115         UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00116         /* Set frame format: 8data, no parity & 1 stop bits */
00117         UCSR1C = (0<<UMSEL0) | (0<<USBS0) | (1<<UCSZ1) | (1<<UCSZ0) | (0<<UCSZ2);
00118         /* Enable receiver and transmitter */
00119         UCSR1B = (1<<RXEN1) | (1<<TXEN1);
00120 }
00121 
00126 unsigned char usart1_transmit(char  data ) {
00127         /* Wait for empty transmit buffer */
00128         while (!( UCSR1A & (1<<UDRE1)));
00129         /* Put data into buffer, sends the data */
00130         UDR1 = data;
00131         return 0;
00132 }
00133

00142                 usart1_transmit(*(data++));
00143         
00144         return 0;
00145 }
